tool.name: Sort BED files
tool.help:
**What it does**
Sorts a feature file by chromosome and other criteria.
.. class:: warningmark
It should be noted that sortBed is merely a convenience utility, as the UNIX sort utility will sort BED files more quickly while using less memory. For example, UNIX sort will sort a BED file by chromosome then by start position in the following manner: sort -k 1,1 -k2,2 -n a.bed
------
This tool is part of the `bedtools package`__ from the `Quinlan laboratory`__. If you use this tool, please cite `Quinlan AR, and Hall I.M. BEDTools: A flexible framework for comparing genomic features. Bioinformatics, 2010, 26, 6.`__
